meanings.definition: Subliteratures: plural noun - literary works that are considered to be of lesser importance or quality compared to mainstream literature.
meanings.sent1: Many people enjoy reading subliteratures for a quick escape from reality.
meanings.sent2: The library had a small section dedicated to subliteratures.
meanings.sent3: The book club decided to read subliteratures for a change of pace.
meanings.sent4: In the world of literature, subliteratures are often overshadowed by bestsellers.
meanings.sent5: Despite their critics, subliteratures have their own dedicated fan base.
